comments_since_last_sample.body: Very nice!  I’m not really a “modern”’style fan, because I think the pieces lack charter and charm most this time.  But I really like how your piece is modern, but with almost a grunge feel!  It gives it so much charter.  I’ve washed tons of different colors, I usually lean towards gray washes, but now I most definitely have to try black!  Whenever I’ve “washed” a piece and need a black color, I’ve always used pitch black glaze by GF and I love love love it, but it’s not quite the same look.  So goodwill here I come to find the perfect piece to try this out!  Thanks for sharing all your amazing creations!
